description: An ancient Mesopotamian city located between the two Zab rivers (modern Erbel/Erbil in Iraq): BAtlas 89 G4 Arbela/Arba-ilu.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Erbil IRQ

properties.title: Old town (citadel) of Erbel in Iraq

locations.details: Geometry was selected by hand in Google Earth at an eye altitude of 1.1km; roughly center-of-mass of the citadel. Note J.F. Hansman in EncIran: "The present old town of Erbel is built on a mound of the debris of successive settlements rising some twenty meters."

locations.title: Old town (citadel) of Erbel in Iraq

names.description: Toponym used by Strabo.
names.details: The toponym Artakene seems to occur only in Strabo (16.1.4). The apparatus criticus to Hamilton's (1903) edition of Strabo offers suggestions about how the singleton toponym might be best interpreted.
